articles.title: PUBG is shutting down in India and people are bidding farewell on social media with memes - The Indian Express
articles.description: PUBG Mobile and 117 other applications were banned by the Information and Technology Ministry in September, but those who had downloaded the game could still play it. That ends on October 30.
